verbs.description: [ARG0: The Trump administration] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: it will withdraw from the United Nations ' human rights body , the latest step by the White House to distance itself from human rights concerns around the globe] .

The Trump administration said Tuesday it [V: will] withdraw from the United Nations ' human rights body , the latest step by the White House to distance itself from human rights concerns around the globe .

The Trump administration said Tuesday it will withdraw from the United Nations ' human rights body , the latest step by the White House to [V: distance] [ARG1: itself] [ARG2: from human rights concerns around the globe] .
